text: "He wanted to get to her as soon as he could," the source told People. "He told her that he couldn't care less about the jewelry; he's just thankful that she's okay." Kardashian — who was in the City of Light for Fashion Week — considered getting robbed one of her "biggest fears," an insider close to the reality star told People.
title: Kim Kardashian was bound, gagged and begging for life during Paris jewelry robbery

meta_data.description: Kardashian thought the men “were for sure going to kill her,” a source said.
